snippet: We take peculiar pleasure in presenting our readers with the subjoined patriotic and eloquent letter of our Minister at Paris to one of our most esteemed fellow-citizens in regard to the late proud achievement of the gallant little America. It is ...
lead_paragraph: We take peculiar pleasure in presenting our readers with the subjoined patriotic and eloquent letter of our Minister at Paris to one of our most esteemed fellow-citizens in regard to the late proud achievement of the gallant little America. It is made up of noble sentiments nobly spoken, reflecting honor alike upon its author and its subject:

headline.main: Letter from Mr. Rives, -- The Yacht America.
